text: log aap se hurmath waale mahino45 mein ladaayi ki baabath46 sawaal karte hai, aap kehdi jiye ke un mein ladaayi karna bada gunaah hai, lekin Allah ki raah se rokna, us ke saath kufr karna, aur masjid haraam se rokna, wahaa ke rehne waalo ko wahaa se nikaalna, Allah ke nazdeek is se bhi bada gunaah hai, ye fitna qatal se bhi bada gunaah hai, ye log tum se ladaayi bhidaayi karte hee rahenge yahaa tak ke agar un se ho sake to tumhe tumhaare deen se murtad47 karde aur tum se jo log apne deen se palat jaaye aur osi kufr ki haalath mein mare un ke amaal dunyaawi aur uqravi sub ghaarath ho jayenge, ye log jahannami honge aur hamesha hamesha jahannam mein hee rahenge
